mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.title, p.create_time, p.comment_count, p.like_count FROM post_like l JOIN post p ON p.id = l.post_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM post_like WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_like (user_id, post_id, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE create_time = VALUES(create_time)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_like WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND post_id = #{postId}
